hero.title: Your Beautiful Hair! Confident You!
hero.subtitle: Professional hair styling and beauty care in the heart of Oulu. Experience expert care and personalized service that brings out your natural beauty.
services.title: Our Services
services.intro: We offer professional hair and beauty services for all occasions. Each service is tailored to your specific needs, and our skilled experts ensure you get the best possible results.
services.haircut.title: Precision Haircut
services.haircut.description: Expert haircuts tailored to your face shape and style preferences. Includes consultation, wash, cut, and styling.
services.coloring.title: Hair Coloring
services.coloring.description: From natural highlights to vibrant fashion colors, our expert colorists create the perfect shade for your desired look.
services.styling.title: Special Event Styling
services.styling.description: Professional hair styling for weddings, parties, and special occasions. Includes consultation and trial styling.
services.treatment.title: Hair Treatment
services.treatment.description: Restorative treatments for damaged hair, including deep conditioning, protein treatments, and scalp care.
services.extensions.title: Hair Extensions
services.extensions.description: High-quality hair extensions applied by certified professionals. Natural-looking results that blend seamlessly.
services.grooming.title: Beard & Facial Grooming
services.grooming.description: Expert beard shaping, trimming, and facial hair grooming services. Includes hot towel treatment and precise detailing for a polished look.
